name: No Paper
description:
No Paper

There is a man who is in trouble because there is no paper in the toilet.

He expects miracles to happen.

Help him out by giving him some toilet paper.

There are 5 levels in all.

Made for the Pixelated Toast Game Jam

Controls:

Left, Right / A, D - Change throw direction

Space / Click - Throw a paper

R - Reset

The more the timing gauge when you click, the stronger you can throw.

Credits:

Music - MaouDamashii
